products.name: comfort cove

products.name: modern retreat
products.desc: Modular cubes create endless configuration possibilities. Layers of increasing density foam in the base offer the perfect balance of softness and support.

products.name: dream haven

products.desc: Pursue serenity at home. Create your own personal sanctuary, a special place where you can experience comfort within.

products.name: coastal breeze
products.desc: A clean-lined fancy face top featuring glossy dark marble with a polished finish.

products.name: artisan forge
products.desc: Furniture's artisans hand-apply all finishes, taking careful steps to ensure each piece has the care and attention required to enhance the natural character of the furniture.

products.name: regal heights

products.desc: Mixed materials bring this unique lounge chair from our SPN to life. Features black titanium steel legs with solid wood armrests.

products.name: lodge modern
products.desc: a contemporary club chair with playful, bent ply arms and a sculptural profile. This unique design is available with fabric or top-grain leather upholstery to contrast a walnut-finished exterior frame.

products.name: gramercy park
products.desc: The Braeburn Power Sofa with Power Headrest exudes soft modern style with a bustle back, open flange stitching detail and square wood feet in a dark finish.

products.name: silverado
products.desc: distinctive raised panel molding on the walnut creek bed elegantly frames cathedral grain patterns in the rich walnut veneers. Raised molding is repeated in the design of the side rails and footboard.

products.name: leather wingback
products.desc: Developed by one of America's premier manufacturers to offer quality furniture at affordable prices. Each piece is meticulously hand-crafted using the most exquisite leather in the world.
